title: Mechanical Engineer

sections.full_text:
Mechanical Engineer
AeroNova Edmonton, AB

Responsibilities:
- Design mechanical components for aerospace projects
- Run FEA simulations (ANSYS, SolidWorks Simulation)
- Perform tolerance analysis and testing
- Work with manufacturing teams for fabrication
sections.skills:
- SolidWorks, CAD
- FEA, stress analysis
- MATLAB or Python

Preferred:
